General.Name: ENVIONEER Co.Ltd
General.Description: ENVIONEER Co.,Ltd. produces and sells liquid and air filters, and filter papers for environmental industry. The company's products include ENPURE liquid media, ENPURE-Plus electropositive charge media, Enair microfiber glass air media, and ENCOAL coalescer media; and filters, as well as various non-woven products. Its products are used in water treatment fields, such as household water purifiers, industrial water treatment facilities, and nuclear power plants. ENVIONEER Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Seongnam, South Korea.
